page.title: 16SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Several people said they had experienced ghostly happenings in our survey area,but none came more exciting than the woman who reported being jostled in the pews of her local church.She told us of her story,and how she went to pray but found herself being pushed from all sides as if the church was overcrowded. Another member of the community that we interviewed brought back to life his distraught story of how many people believed that a small goblin- like man was present in his bedroom.He continued to reminisce and stated how even mediums staying at his house had the same feeling.At last he took part in a occult style service,and surprisingly enough the man never appeared again.His story is generally believed as at the time he was running for the local parliament.
